SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mr. Nick Haberman’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope my children will see Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s dream of a "Beloved Community" come to fruition in which all people can share in the wealth of the earth…”

– Mr. Nick Haberman, Director of LIGHT Education Initiative @shalerarea @PittEducation https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/martin-luther-king-dream-beloved-community-share-wealth-earth/
